## CompositeJsonMap class

A CompositeJsonMap presents a composed view of one or more other JsonReferenceMaps.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CompositeJsonMap implements IJsonReferenceMap 
```
**Implements:** [IJsonReferenceMap](./ts-json.jsonreferencemap.md)
